languages.text: "Я помню как ты помогала им убирать трупы из моей клетки, Вени'Идира. Ты выглядела... умиротворенной".
"I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."
languages.original_text: "Я помню как ты помогала им убирать трупы из моей клетки, Вени'Идира. Ты выглядела... умиротворенной".

traits.locale_text: "I remember you helping them clear away my corpses, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."
"I remember you helping them clear away my corpses, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."
"I remember you helping them clear away my corpses, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."
"I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."
"I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."
"I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich, dass Ihr ihnen geholfen habt, die Leichen aus meiner Zelle zu entfernen, Veni'Idira. Ihr saht ... friedlich aus."
languages.original_text: "I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich, dass Ihr ihnen geholfen habt, die Leichen aus meiner Zelle zu entfernen, Veni'Idira. Ihr saht ... friedlich aus."

languages.text: « Je me souviens que vous m'avez aidée à déplacer les cadavres qui encombraient ma cellule, Veni'Idira. Vous aviez l'air... en paix. »
languages.original_text: "I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."

traits.locale_text: « Je me souviens que vous m'avez aidée à déplacer les cadavres qui encombraient ma cellule, Veni'Idira. Vous aviez l'air... en paix. »

languages.text: «Recuerdo que ayudó a limpiar los cadáveres de mi celda, Veni'Idira. Su aspecto era... pacífico».
languages.original_text: "I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerdo que ayudó a limpiar los cadáveres de mi celda, Veni'Idira. Su aspecto era... pacífico».

languages.text: 「あなたが檻の中の死体を片付ける手伝いをしてくれたのを覚えています、ヴェニイディラ。あなたは…穏やかな顔つきをしていますね」
languages.original_text: "I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが檻の中の死体を片付ける手伝いをしてくれたのを覚えています、ヴェニイディラ。あなたは…穏やかな顔つきをしていますね」

languages.text: “我记得你之前帮他们把尸体从我的牢房里清理出去，帷者伊迪拉。你当时看起来……很平静。”
languages.original_text: "I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."

traits.locale_text: “我记得你之前帮他们把尸体从我的牢房里清理出去，帷者伊迪拉。你当时看起来……很平静。”

languages.original_text: "I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."

languages.text: "Onlara hücremdeki cesetleri çıkarmaya yardım ettiğini hatırlıyorum Veni'İdira. Yüzünde... Huzurlu bir ifade vardı."
languages.original_text: "I remember you helping them to remove the corpses from my cell, Veni'Idira. You looked... peaceful."
